segments.text: Tell me about yourself and your past experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the past 3 years , I have been working in China East Airlines Corporation Limited . I'm very tolerant of people and have been told that this is one of my strengths . I feel I have a lot to offer as a team member .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you interested in this occupation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's always been my dream to be a stewardess . And I like travelling to different places .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the chief characteristic for a stewardess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , a stewardess should be friendly , courteous , patient and treat passengers kindly and politely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I know how to control my temper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If a passenger had a accident , what would you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would give him or her basic first aid and ask my partner to call for assistance at the same time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you are hired , when can you start work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can begin to work right away because I am out of work now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really need more information about the job before we start to discuss salary . I'd like to postpone that discussion until later . Maybe you could tell me what is budgeted for the position and how your commission structure works .
segments.speaker: S2
